```{r def-libraries, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
packagesList <- c("bookdown",
				   "knitr",
				   "rmarkdown",
				   "Seurat",
				   "scater",
				   "clusterProfiler",
				   "tidyseurat",
				   "monocle3",
				   "DT",
				   "ggplot2",
				   "Matrix",
				   "dplyr",
				   "RColorBrewer",
				   "viridis",
				   "wesanderson",
				   "gskb",
				   "ggExtra",
				   "ggpubr")
lapply(packagesList, require, character.only = TRUE)
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r setup-knitr, include=FALSE}

knitr::write_bib(c(
				 .packages(), packagesList),
```
